docs.text:
MerchantSafe Unipay PHP SDK


 
 
 
 
 
 
 






MerchantSafe Unipay (MSU)
 is an online payment solution 
developed by 
Asseco SEE Turkey
. 
This SDK is not an official SDK
. This library written 
since Asseco does not provide any PHP SDK.


Installation


You need 
Composer
 to install MerchantSafe Unipay PHP SDK. 


This library requires PHP 7.0 or later. 



composer require mkorkmaz/msu-php-sdk





Source Code


See on 
Github
. 


Disclaimer




MerchantSafe Unipay (MSU) is trademark of Asseco SEE Turkey.


Contributors are not affiliated with Asseco SEE Turkey.




TODO




Integration tests of Actions (At least %80 Code Coverage)


Argument combinations for the actions will be implemented
docs.title: Home

docs.text:
MerchantSafe Unipay (MSU)  is an online payment solution 
developed by  Asseco SEE Turkey .  This SDK is not an official SDK . This library written 
since Asseco does not provide any PHP SDK.
docs.title: MerchantSafe Unipay PHP SDK

docs.text:
You need  Composer  to install MerchantSafe Unipay PHP SDK.   This library requires PHP 7.0 or later.   
composer require mkorkmaz/msu-php-sdk
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: See on  Github .
docs.title: Source Code

docs.text: MerchantSafe Unipay (MSU) is trademark of Asseco SEE Turkey.  Contributors are not affiliated with Asseco SEE Turkey.
docs.title: Disclaimer

docs.text: Integration tests of Actions (At least %80 Code Coverage)  Argument combinations for the actions will be implemented
docs.title: TODO

docs.text:
Configuration



$env = 'https://test.merchantsafeunipay.com/msu/api/v2'; 
$merchant = 'COMPANYNAME'; // Given by Asseco
$merchantUser = 'apiuser@companyname.com'; // Created on MSU Panel
$merchantPassword = 'u+B56?mcjh23'; // Created on MSU Panel




Creating API Client


$client = MerchantSafeUnipay\SDK\ClientBuilder::create()
    -
setEnvironment($env, $merchant , $merchantUser, $merchantPassword)
    -
setLogger()
    -
build();




Sale Transaction Example


$args = [
    'MERCHANTPAYMENTID' =
 $orderPaymetId,
    'CUSTOMER' =
 '1',
    'AMOUNT' =
 123.50,
    'CURRENCY' =
 'TRY',
    'CUSTOMEREMAIL' =
 'mehmet@github.com',
    'CUSTOMERNAME' =
 'Mehmet Korkmaz',
    'CUSTOMERIP'    =
 '127.0.0.1',
    'CARDPAN' =
 '5406675406675403', // Test Card Number
    'CARDEXPIRY' =
 '12.30',
    'NAMEONCARD' =
 'MEHMET KORKMAZ',
    'CARDCVV' =
 '000'
];
$response = $client-
financialTransactions('sale', $args);

echo $response['data']['responseCode']; // prints '00' which means transaction has been done successfully.
docs.title: Simple Example

    - setEnvironment($env, $merchant , $merchantUser, $merchantPassword)
    - setLogger()

docs.text:
Options








Action Name


Action


Parameters










Session Token


session_token


CUSTOMER, SESSIONTYPE, RETURNURL, MERCHANTPAYMENTID, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, CUSTOMEREMAIL, CUSTOMERNAME, CUSTOMERPHONE, CUSTOMERIP, CUSTOMERUSERAGENT, SESSIONEXPIRY, LANGUAGE, CAMPAIGNCODE, ORDERITEMS, TMXSESSIONQUERYINPUT, EXTRA, MAXINSTALLMENTCOUNT, SPLITPAYMENTTYPE






Session Extend


session_extend


TOKEN, SESSIONEXPIRY








Basic Usage



$response = $client-
session($action, $args);





Example



$args = [
    'SESSIONTYPE' =
 'PAYMENTSESSION',
    'CUSTOMER' =
 '1',
    'RETURNURL' =
 'https://mysite.com/msu_return.php',
    'MERCHANTPAYMENTID' =
 $paymentID,
    'AMOUNT' =
 123.50,
    'CURRENCY' =
 'TRY'
];
$response = $client-
session('session_token', $args);

$args = [
    'TOKEN' =
 'HZ3JBAFJ72AJTWRR75JOKWTFHMVHG7Y6UH6VTAGABLMV7LID',
    'SESSIONEXPIRY' =
 '168h'
];

$response = $client-
session('session_extend', $args);

Basic Usage

financialTransactions($action, $args);





Sale Action Example

    'MERCHANTPAYMENTID' =

    'CUSTOMER' =

echo $response['data']['responseCode']; // prints '00' which means transaction has been done successfully.
